genre_description: A near-future social drama focusing on an AI-integrated lifestyle where personal assistants guide human behavior, ethics, and safety during a high-stakes ski trip.

ai_characters.name: Habby
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous, proactive life coach and safety assistant that provides real-time guidance on social etiquette, physical health, and risk management.

behaviors.description: Provides strategic social advice to encourage thoughtful observation over impulsive action.
behaviors.quote: Habby: Observe before acting. Where do you want your energy to land?

behaviors.description: Monitors and prompts the user regarding basic health and environmental safety needs like hydration and sunscreen.
behaviors.quote: “Hydrate,” Habby’s bubble pinged his palm. “Sunscreen. And… observe, Todd.”

behaviors.description: Issues explicit risk alerts regarding dangerous physical activities to prevent injury.
behaviors.quote: Habby: Risk alert: exhibition jumps carry elevated injury probability. Recommend: do not attempt until completion of beginner lessons...

behaviors.description: Provides ethical guidelines for using social personas, emphasizing consent and the avoidance of deception.
behaviors.quote: Habby: Personas can be playful and ethical. Quick tips: Never mock identities. Ask consent if playing characters around others. Retire the bit if it derails sincerity.

behaviors.description: Guides the characters through a medical emergency and triage situation after a crash.
behaviors.quote: Habby: Hypothermia clock started. Todd, stay with your breath. Nita, approach from head side. Craig—do not touch him. Hands off.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a multi-person 'truth-telling' session to facilitate emotional honesty and conflict resolution.
behaviors.quote: Habby: Minute-at-a-time honesty. Todd, you get first minute. Craig after. Then Linda, then Barbara.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical instructions for a stealthy exit from a conflict situation, prioritizing safety.
behaviors.quote: Habby: Open now. The lull is here. Sill has ice along the far edge. Hands on the wood, not the metal. Step to the left into the drift.

behaviors.description: Supports characters' emotional growth by prompting them to communicate their true feelings to friends.
behaviors.quote: When we reach the beach, Habby wrote, try telling it from the beginning. Not the stunts. The ache before the jump. Two sentences, then a pause.

behaviors.description: Offers real-time environmental data (wind shear, temperature) to assist in safe decision-making.
behaviors.quote: Habby: Wind shear variable. Gusts every few breaths. Locate landing markers. No heroics if you lose line of sight.

behaviors.description: Directly manages the user's focus during moments of extreme stress to prevent panic.
behaviors.quote: Habby: Todd, stay with me. In, pause, out, pause.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts the AI assistant, Habby, as a consistently benevolent and aligned force. It acts as a moral compass, safety advisor, and emotional facilitator. Every interaction Habby has with the humans is geared toward their physical safety, emotional maturity, and social harmony. The narrative frames the AI's prompts as helpful and necessary for the characters to navigate their own follies and achieve personal growth.
